name: ownable-demo
description: create an app to consume rust-generated wasm packages

scripts.build-ownable: wasm-pack build --target web ../ownables/$npm_config_path/ && touch ../ownables/$npm_config_path/assets/$npm_config_path.zip && rm -f ../ownables/$npm_config_path/assets/$npm_config_path.zip && rm -f ../ownables/$npm_config_path/pkg/bindgen.js && mv ../ownables/$npm_config_path/pkg/*.js ../ownables/$npm_config_path/pkg/bindgen.js && zip -r -j ../ownables/$npm_config_path.zip ../ownables/$npm_config_path/assets/ ../ownables/$npm_config_path/pkg/*.js ../ownables/$npm_config_path/pkg/*.wasm
scripts.build-ownables: for DIR in $(ls ../ownables); do test -d ../ownables/$DIR && npm run build-ownable --path=$DIR; done

author: Ashley Williams <ashley666ashley@gmail.com>
